Reference

All functions

annot2dpv()

Convert annotation file to dpv

aparc_2_mesh()

Converts annotations fo atlas

asc2ply()

Convert ascii to .ply

atlas_lab2ctab()

Label to ctab

atlas_vol2label()

Volume to label

atlas_vol2surf()

Nifti volume to surface

change_meshes()

Change meshes to new system

check_fs()

Check if FS can be run

ctab_line()

Make a string for ctab writing

curv2asc()

Convert Freesurfer curvature file to ascii

curv2ply()

Convert Freesurfer curvature file to ply

curvnf2asc()

Convert Freesurfer no fix curvature file to ascii

fs_curvatures()

Available Freesurfer curvatures

fs_nofixcurv()

Available Freesurfer no fix curvatures

fs_surfaces()

Available Freesurfer surfaces

get_ctab()

Get colour lut table

get_mesh()

Extract mesh data from ply

getmode()

Find the mode of a vector

ggseg_atlas_repos()

List all online repositories with ggseg-atlases

install_ggseg_atlas()

Install ggseg-atlas from repo

install_ggseg_atlas_all()

Install all ggseg-atlases registeres

is_ctab()

Check if object is colourtable

is_facewise()

Check if dpv is facewise

isolate_region()

Isolate region to alpha channel

lcbc_surf2surf()

Convert LCBC surface file to other subjects

make_aparc_2_3datlas()

Create cortical ggseg3d-atlas from annot-file

make_aseg_2_3datlas()

Subcortical segmentation to atlas

make_ggseg3d_2_ggseg()

Turn ggseg3d-atlas to ggseg

make_ggseg_repo()

Initiate a ggseg atlas repo

make_palette_ggseg()

Create ggseg palette from ggseg3d-atlas

mri_pretess()

Run pre-tesselation on file

mri_smooth()

Smooth data

mri_tessellate()

Tesselate data

mri_vol2label()

Convert volume to label

mri_vol2surf()

Convert volume to surface

mris_annot2label()

Convert annotation to label

mris_label2annot()

Convert Label to Annotation

prep_n_data()

prep data for verteces/faces

read_annotation()

Read Freesurfer annotation file

read_ctab()

Read colourtab

read_dpv()

Read dpv file

restruct_old_3datlas()

Change old atlas setup to new

smooth2srf()

Turn smooth file to ascii

snapshot_brain()

Make snapshots through orca and plotly

subject_2_ascii()

Convert subject surface files to ascii

surf2asc()

Convert Freesurfer surface file to ascii

surf2ply()

Convert Freesurfer surface file into ply

surfsplit()

Split surface file into separate plys

write_ctab()

Write colourtab

write_dpv()

Write DPV file
